### Preventative Maintenance of Automatic Man Doors

**Solicitation Number**: WS3875951017
**Reference Number**: WS3875951017-Doc3937701892
**Amendment Number**: 3
**Publication Date**: March 29, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: May 30, 2023, 2:00 pm EDT

**Request for Proposal**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services, Canada (PSPC) is soliciting a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of preventative maintenance services for automatic man doors at various locations in Ottawa, Ontario. This contract will be for a period of five (5) years.

**Requirements**
The successful bidder must provide all necessary tools, services, materials, travel, and labour to perform the required maintenance work for the equipment.  

**Security Requirements**
The requirement carries security requirements, and bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority to confirm attendance of the person(s) holding a valid security clearance at the required level who will attend.

**Site Visit**
There is an optional site visit associated with this requirement, scheduled to take place at the Confederation Building, 229 Wellington Street, Ottawa, on April 20, 2023, at 10:00 am EDT.

**Tender Evaluation**
The contract will be awarded to the bidder offering the lowest price.

**Commercial Agreements**
This tender has been made available to bidders participating in the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Directions to Tenderers**
 Please submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by May 2, 2023, at 2:00 pm EDT to be considered. 

**Contact Information**
Contact Diane Drouin, Contracting Authority at (613) 998-1322 or [diane.drouin@tpsgc-pwgsc
